$description: Schema with strict type enforcement for PMS-based AOP literature extraction. Focus on anti-hallucination and data quality.
$note: v3.0: Added strict type requirements, control_experiments format enforcement

paper_info.title: string (required)
paper_info.year: integer (required) - MUST be integer, not string

catalyst.name: string | null - Full catalyst name; null for homogeneous systems

reactive_species.identification_methods: array of strings | null - e.g., ['EPR', 'quenching experiments', 'probe compounds']

quenching_experiments.$description: CRITICAL: Set performed=false if NOT described in paper
quenching_experiments.performed: boolean (required) - Whether quenching experiments were conducted
quenching_experiments.scavengers_used: array of strings - Empty array if not performed
quenching_experiments.results: array of objects - Empty array if not performed

results_schema.inhibition_percent: number | null - Only if EXPLICITLY stated in paper
results_schema.effect: string | null - e.g., 'significant inhibition', 'slight inhibition', 'no effect'

EPR_analysis.$description: CRITICAL: Set performed=false if NO EPR/ESR data in paper
EPR_analysis.detected_signals: array of strings - Empty array if not performed

catalytic_mechanism.radical_pathway: boolean | null - MUST be boolean or null, not string
catalytic_mechanism.non_radical_pathway: boolean | null - MUST be boolean or null, not string
catalytic_mechanism.key_active_sites: array of strings - Empty array if not identified
catalytic_mechanism.mechanism_description: string | null - Brief description of activation mechanism

degradation_pathway.main_attack_sites: array of strings - Empty array if not specified
degradation_pathway.reaction_types: array of strings - Empty array if not specified
degradation_pathway.final_products: array of strings - Empty array if not specified

control_experiments.$description: MUST be array of objects, NOT array of strings

object_schema.removal_percent: number | null - Removal percentage if reported
object_schema.rate_constant: number | null - Rate constant if reported

comparative_performance.synergy_observed: boolean | null - MUST be boolean or null, not string like 'Yes'
